name: codesandbox-wechaty-getting-started
description: Wechaty is a Conversational SDK for Chatbot Makers

scripts.start: npm install && npm run gotty && pwd && ls -l && npm ls nodemon && ./gotty --ws-origin '.*' npm run bot
scripts.bot: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-warnings --loader=ts-node/esm" WECHATY_LOG=verbose nodemon -w ding-dong-bot.ts ding-dong-bot.ts
